data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: Imagine someone comes to visit you in your home country to learn about the culture. If you could only give them one food to represent your country, what would you choose and why?
data.answer: The food that I would like to introduce to my lovely foreign friends when they come and visit Korea is kimchi. As a traditional fermented Korean side dish, it is more than just vegetables prepared with a variety of seasonings. Kimchi embodied the identity of a nation. Kimchi has become a symbolic resource for all Korean people. It's a feature that makes Korean cuisine unique. Therefore, in order to help my foreign friends to gain a better understanding of Korean culture, I would like to introduce them to kimchi.
